text: The Saga of the Sanpitch was a collection of biographical short stories, published annually from 1969 to 1998, about early Scandinavian immigrants to the Sanpete Valley. ==External links== * Digitized collection at the University of Utah Library * Saga of the Sanpitch in PDF Category:Sanpete County, Utah Category:Publications established in 1969
title: Saga of the Sanpitch
